What is Homeopathy?

It's health on all levels. It's working through the hard things and
the embarassing issues that prevent you from being you. It's
empowering you to express your full self.

Learn More >>

Chimu Homeopathy is run by David S. Kim, a healing-justice focused homeopath with roots in Scotland and the Pacific.

Visit us in person at the People's Movement Center.
